CheckTitle: Ensure that CodeBuild projects have S3 or CloudWatch logging enabled
Description: From a security perspective, logging is an important feature to enable for future forensics efforts in the case of any security incidents. Correlating anomalies in CodeBuild projects with threat detections can increase confidence in the accuracy of those threat detections.
Risk: Without logging enabled, it may be difficult to identify and investigate security incidents related to CodeBuild projects.

Recommendation.Text: Enable logging for CodeBuild projects to capture build events and logs for future analysis and incident response.
